titleStmt.title: A new catechisme drawn out of the breasts of the Old and New Testament, for the soules nourishment, concerning the blessed sacrament of the Lords Supper, and the visible signe in baptisme. Wherein is set forth, the strong bond and seales of the Covenant betwixt God and his people. With an excellent caution to beware of sectaries. By W. Cotton, B.D. and minister of the true word of God.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Alsop, dwelling neer Cripplegate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
